get.description: Returns information about a single complaint.

allOf.description: Base complaint object

record_id.description: The ID that was given to this complaint by the orginal source of the data.

record_type.description: The type of record the complaint is associated with.

court.description: The court the legal action was filed in.

judge.description: The judge who presided over the case.

docket_number.description: The docket number of the case.

date_of_action.description: The date the legal action was filed.

record_type.description: The type of record the complaint is associated with.
The type of record the complaint is associated with.

publication_date.description: The date the publication was released.

record_type.description: The type of record the complaint is associated with.

reporting_agency.description: The agency that reported the record.

reporting_agency_url.description: The url of the agency that reported the record.

reporting_agency_email.description: The email of the agency that reported the record.

record_type.description: The type of record the complaint is associated with.

incident_date.description: The date and time the incident occurred.

recieved_date.description: The date and time the complaint was received by the reporting source.

closed_date.description: The date and time the complaint was closed.

state.description: The state of the incident.

zip.description: The zip code of the incident.

civilian_witnesses.description: The civilian witnesses associated with the complaint.

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

attachements.description: Documents and multimeida associated with the complaint.

created_at.description: Date and time the complaint was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time the complaint was last updated.

contact_email.description: Contact email for the source organization.

members.description: Url to get all members of the source.

reported_complaints.description: Url to get all complaints reported by the source.

allOf.description: The source that reported the complaint.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the review board.

name.description: The name of the review board.

city.description: The city the review board is located in.

state.description: The state the review board is located in.

url.description: The website URL for the review board.

allOf.description: The civilian review board that reviewed the complaint.

police_witnesses.description: The police witnesses associated with the complaint.

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the officer

state_ids.description: The state ids of the officer

uid.description: The UUID of this state id

state.description: The state of the state id

id_name.description: The name of the id. For example, Tax ID, Driver's License, etc.

employment_history.description: A link to retrieve the employment history of the officer

allegations.description: A link to retrieve the allegations against the officer

litigation.description: A link to retrieve the litigation against the officer

allegations.description: The allegations associated with the complaint.

record_id.description: The ID that was given to this allegation by the orginal source of the data.

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

allOf.description: Demographic information of the individual who filed the complaint.

allegation.description: The allegation made by the complaintant.

sub_type.description: The sub type of the allegation.

recomended_finding.description: The finding recomended by the review board.

recomended_outcome.description: The outcome recomended by the review board.

outcome.description: The final outcome of the allegation.

state.description: The state of the state id

allegations.description: A link to retrieve the allegations against the officer
